from t_op_key where REQST_SRC_CODE=#{reqstSrcCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CRKEY_TYPE_CD=#{crkeyTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND BIZ_TYPE_CD=#{bizTypeCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND VALID_FLAG = '1'
